title: FiThletics Interval Wear
summary: Control your interval Training with your android Wear or your smarphone
description: Control your interval Training with Android Wear smart Watch or your smartphone.Characteristics:- Independent smartWatch mode.- Custom Intervals.- When you add, modify or delete interval in your phone, the app automatically synchronize the smartwatch.- Control the app with Android Wear smartWatch.- Switch on / off for the vibration and sound of the intervals.- Background Mode.Future characteristics:- Heart rate tracking (External heart rate, interval heart rate in Moto 360 and gear live are inaccurate)
descriptionHTML:
Control your interval Training with Android Wear smart Watch or your smartphone.

Characteristics:
- Independent smartWatch mode.
- Custom Intervals.
- When you add, modify or delete interval in your phone, the app automatically synchronize the smartwatch.
- Control the app with Android Wear smartWatch.
- Switch on / off for the vibration and sound of the intervals.
- Background Mode.

Future characteristics:
- Heart rate tracking (External heart rate, interval heart rate in Moto 360 and gear live are inaccurate)
comments: I wish I can setup my own intervals All u can do is use an interval that comes with it but I wanna make my own
